level.heading: Regulations.
level.text: The Commissioner may issue rules and regulations relating to captive insurers as are necessary to enable him or her to carry out the provisions of this chapter.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 31-3931.06, § 31-3931.22, and § 31-3932.03.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see § 22 of Captive Insurance Company Emergency Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-640, November 30, 2004, 52 DCR 1238).
